name: The price of apples
instruction:
It is known that 'a' kg of apples costs b dollars. Find out how much 1 kg of apples costs.

Set the variable `weight` and assign it a value of any non-negative number (the weight of apples).
Set the variable `cost` and assign it a value of any non-negative number (the cost of apples).
Set the variable `price`, in which you calculate the price of 1 kg of apples.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what needs to be done,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
const amount = 10;
const money = 1000;
const price = money / amount;
```
